text: but Jimmy's always wanted a chunker of
his very own one that is the pure
embodiment of the fat Jimmy spirit you
know I've always had in the back of my
mind I really wanted to build a new
machine but I was too lazy or
procrastinated too long to build one
every year that all changed when Jimmy
met a stranger named Stephen Smith at a
local flea market I got to talking to
him about Punkin Chunkin and he seemed
all excited about it and he seemed to
have some great ideas for a new design
they scrawled a few concepts on napkins
and scraps of paper and a new human
power chunker that Jimmy calls High
Times began to take shape
high timeses rider will pedal a bicycle
hooked up to a gear system of motorcycle
parts those gears will stretch rubber
power bands creating tension the power
bands will then be hooked onto cables
connected to the throwing arm when the
tension is released the bands will snap
back pulling the arm up with them of
course
Jimmy being Jimmy hi times will be built
four equal parts business and pleasure
this bus I'm going to take and slide it
straight across here so we can sit in
there and have our meetings naturally we
will have to have a tap system for
refreshments and keep us hydrated this
year fat Jimmy is going to eat well I'm
having a pig roaster built to mount onto
the trailer and into a slide and the pig
rush will come out here to cook the pigs
